page.title: 12Life of an Ashington child.
page.content: I am called Antony Tooke.On Thursday I woke up late.I had cornflakes for breakfast,cleaned my teeth and got ready for school.I went to seek Michael. We went to the hall to practise some songs.Then we went into the classroom and did multiplication squares,there were no recorders for boys. After lunch we did Young Geographer and I finished it.I helped Alison transplant my beans and peas.We carefully took the peas out of the tray.We put soil into pots and I put a hole in with my finger and put the seedlings into the hole. The teacher read us a story and then i went home for tea.
